src:
Ketua DPD RI Berharap Suport Pemprov Jatim untuk Bangun Kantor Perwakilan
01 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Anik Hasanah


Ketua DPD RI Berharap Suport Pemprov Jatim untuk Bangun Kantor Perwakilan

KBRN, Surabaya : Kunjungi Jawa Timur, Ketua Dewan Perwakilan Daerah (DPD) RI, La Nyala Mahmud Mattaliti berharap mendapatkan hibah tanah untuk dijadikan kantor. Harapan tersebut diminta Lanyala kepada Gubernur Jatim, Khofifah Indar Parawansa. "Kami berharap bisa diberikan hibah tanah, nanti biar pembangunannya dari APBN dan Alhamdulillah beliau (Khofifah, red) menyanggupi itu," ujarnya di Grahadi, Jumat (1/11/2019).La Nyala tidak menyebut secara spesifik seperti apa bangunan tersebut. Namun dia merinci, bangunan yang layak untuk berkantor, terdiri dari dua lantai, memiliki banyak ruang kerja. Dengan ukuran tanah sekitar 2000 - 5000 meter. "Karena kita ini kan menampung aspirasi masyarakat di Jawa Timur. Jadi ada beberapa ruangan, kalau tanah ya 2000-5000 meter sudah pantas," tuturnya. La Nyala mengaku saat ini masih mencari aset aset yang bisa dihibahkan. "Nanti mudah mudahan dalam waktu dekat sudah dapat jawaban," katanya. Sementara itu, Khofifah mengaku gedung DPD RI di Jatim ini harus dibahas kebutuhannya, jika anggotanya empat orang kemudian stafnya berapa. Sebetulnya, lanjut Khofifah, harus dibahas bersama terkait detail secara fungsional."Tapi kalau harus ada meeting room, nah ini untuk berapa org. Kan master plan dari sebuah gedung harus detail," tambahnya. Jika saat ini yang ditawarkan adalah di kesbangpol. Tetapi menurut pihak DPD RI lokasinya kurang representatif.
text:
Chairman of DPD RI Hopes that East Java Provincial Government Supports to Build Representative Offices
01 Nov 2019, 13:30 by Anik Hasanah


Chairman of DPD RI Hopes that East Java Provincial Government Supports to Build Representative Offices

KBRN, Surabaya: Visiting East Java, Chairman of the Indonesian Regional Representative Council (DPD), La Nyala Mahmud Mattaliti hopes to get a land grant to become an office. That hope was requested by Lanyala to the Governor of East Java, Khofifah Indar Parawansa. "We hope that land grants can be given, so that the development from the State Budget and Alhamdulillah, he (Khofifah, red) agreed," he said in Grahadi, Friday (11/01/2019). La Nyala did not mention specifically what the building was like. But he detailed, a proper building for an office, consisting of two floors, has a lot of work space. With a land size of around 2000 - 5000 meters. "Because we are accommodating the aspirations of the people in East Java. So there are several rooms, if the land is 2000-5000 meters it is appropriate," he said. La Nyala admitted that he was still looking for assets that could be donated. "Hopefully in the near future we will get an answer," he said. Meanwhile, Khofifah admitted that the DPD RI building in East Java had to discuss their needs, if there were four members then how many staff. Actually, continued Khofifah, it had to be discussed together related to functional details. "But if there must be a meeting room, well, this is for how many people. The master plan of a building must be detailed," he added. If currently offered is in Kesbangpol. But according to the DPD RI the location is less representative.
